items.sentence: I can't come up with a good excuse for being late for the dentist.
Take your time. I know you need a couple of days to reflect on it.
I don't know why it took me so long to get over my cold this time.
Tom is a fast runner. You'll have a hard time keeping up with him.
The husband of the woman Tom had been hanging out with killed him.
I hope that you will like your new school. It's a wonderful place.
When we started out, we had only three hundred dollars between us.
I didn't expect to succeed, but somehow I managed to carry it off.
I've been waiting since six o'clock and still my turn hasn't come.
Tom preferred the company of his dogs over that of his fellow men.
